name: frontend
description: ## File structure ``` |   index.html |   .gitignore |   package.json |   README.md | +---css |   |   conversation.css | +---js |   |   apiHandler.js |   |   conversation.js |   |   init.js |   |   panel.js |   |   services.js | ```

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dist/v1/js/compiled.js -o dist/v1/js/bundle.min.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/v1/js/apiHandler.js -o dist/v1/js/apiHandler.js -c -m
scripts.compile: npm run babel && npm run worker && npm run build-css

author: shikhar
